lead_paragraph: Several new cookbooks target today’s home kitchens with eclectic recipes and strategies for planning.

headline.print_headline: Practical Magic for the Modern Kitchen
headline.main: Review: Practical Magic for the Modern Cook

snippet: Several new cookbooks target today’s home kitchens with eclectic recipes and strategies for planning....
abstract: Food writer Tejal Rao examines five just released or soon-to-be released cookbooks that offer their own vision of modern home cooking; recipes for Swiss chard slab pie and one-pot spaghetti offered.
